title: Delhi EV sales plummet after road tax waiver withdrawal, prices jump 10%
description: Electric vehicle sales in Delhi have nearly halted after the state government withdrew a road tax waiver on EVs, causing prices to rise by 10%. This move has significantly impacted sales of electric two-wheelers and four-wheelers. Industry stakeholders plan to meet with state transport authorities to address their concerns.
